import Head from '../../components/Head' import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { useCurrentUser } from '../../lib/hooks'; import Router from 'next/router' import middleware from '../../middlewares/middleware' import {getSingleUpdated} from '../../lib/db' export async function getServerSideProps(context) { await middleware.apply(context.req, context.res); const single = await getSingleUpdated(context.req, context.params._update, '_id'); if (!single) context.res.statusCode = 404; return {props:{single}} } const Update=(props)=>{ console.log(props, " getting it here") const {single} = props.single; const [user] = useCurrentUser(); const [errMsg, setErrMsg] = useState('') const [auth, setAuth] = useState(false) const [inputValue, setInputValue] = useState({ image_link:single.image_link, caption:single.caption, author:single.author, source:single.source, source_link:single.source_link, category:single.category, headings:single.headings, abstract_cat:single.abstract_cat, content:single.content }) useEffect(()=>{ }) const handleInput = (e)=>{ const value = e.target.value; setInputValue({...inputValue, [e.target.name]:value}) } async function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault(); const body = { post_id: e.currentTarget.post_id.value, image_link: e.currentTarget.image_link.value, caption: e.currentTarget.caption.value, author: e.currentTarget.author.value, source: e.currentTarget.source.value, source_link: e.currentTarget.source_link.value, category: e.currentTarget.category.value, headings: e.currentTarget.headings.value, abstract_cat: e.currentTarget.abstract_cat.value, content: e.currentTarget.content.value, date: new Date() }; try{ const res = await fetch(`/api/posts`, { method: 'PUT', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify(body), }); if(res.status==200||res.status==201){setErrMsg("updated successfully")} } catch(err){ setErrMsg("An error occured, pls check your internet connection and try again") } } return(

NEWS POST

{errMsg &&
{errMsg}
}
) } export default Update;
